text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, becoming easterlies.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain later. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy. Periods of rain. Mist. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Mist at first. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 5 easterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
